mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_no as reservationNo, r.food_no as foodNo, r.reservation_count as reservationCount, r.customer_no as customerNo, r.customer_name as customerName, r.reservation_date as reservationDate FROM food AS f INNER JOIN food_reservation AS r ON f.food_no = r.food_no WHERE f.franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}

SELECT food_no as foodNo, file_name as fileName, extension as extension, content_type as contentType, size as size, origin_name as originName FROM food_pic WHERE food_no IN ( SELECT food_no FROM food WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo} )
SELECT food_no as foodNo, food_name as foodName, food_category as foodCategory, food_price as foodPrice FROM food WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food_pic ( food_no, file_name, extension, content_type, size, origin_name ) VALUES( #{foodNo}, #{fileName}, #{extension}, #{contentType}, #{size}, #{originName} )
INSERT INTO food ( food_no, franchisee_no, food_name, food_category, food_price ) VALUES( #{foodNo}, #{franchisee.franchiseeNo}, #{foodName}, #{foodCategory}, #{foodPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT qna_no as qnaNo, customer_no as customerNo, qna_type as qnaType, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_question as qnaQuestion, qna_answer as qnaAnswer, qna_date as qnaDate FROM franchisee_qna WHERE customer_no = #{ownerNo}

SELECT customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_pw as customerPw, customer_name as customerName, customer_birth as customerBirth, customer_gender as customerGender, customer_email as customerEmail, customer_phone as customerPhone, customer_type as customerType FROM customer WHERE customer_no = #{String}

SELECT franchisee_no as FranchiseeNo, pic_no as picNo, file_name as fileName, extension as extension, content_type as contentType, size as size, origin_name as originName FROM franchisee_pic GROUP BY franchisee_no HAVING MIN(pic_no)
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, file_name as fileName, extension as extension, content_type as contentType, size as size, origin_name as originName FROM franchisee_pic WHERE pic_no = #{picNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO franchisee_qna( customer_no, qna_type, qna_title, qna_question, qna_date, customer_mail ) VALUES ( #{customerNo}, #{qnaType}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaQuestion}, NOW(), #{customerMail} )
mapper.select: SELECT spec_no as specNo, spec_name as specName FROM spec WHERE spec_type = #{specType} ORDER BY spec_name

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM franchisee_faq
faq_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
SELECT pic_no as picNo, franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, file_name as fileName, extension as extension, origin_name as originName FROM franchisee_pic WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, cpu as cpu, vga as vga, ram as ram FROM franchisee_spec WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO franchisee_spec( franchisee_no, cpu, vga, ram ) VALUES ( #{franchiseeNo}, #{cpu}, #{vga}, #{ram} )
INSERT INTO franchisee_pic ( franchisee_no, file_name, extension, content_type, size, origin_name ) VALUES( #{franchiseeNo}, #{fileName}, #{extension}, #{contentType}, #{size}, #{originName} )
mapper.select: SELECT seat_no as seatNo, seat_row as seatRow, seat_cols as seatCols, seat_use as seatUse FROM seat WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}

SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, franchisee_crn as franchiseeCrn, franchisee_name as franchiseeName, franchisee_phone as franchiseePhone, owner_no as ownerNo FROM franchisee WHERE franchisee_no = #{franchiseeNo}
SELECT franchisee_no as franchiseeNo, franchisee_name as franchiseeName FROM franchisee WHERE owner_no = #{owner_no}
